name: Clifton Strengths Profile
description: Identify how your character expresses these four personality domains to accomplish their goals

attributes.name: Executing
attributes.description: Which themes represent how they work to achieve their goals? (e.g. Achiever, Discipline, Focus)

attributes.name: Influencing
attributes.description: Which themes represent how they communicate and persuade others to achieve their goals? (e.g. Command, Maximizer, Woo)

attributes.name: Relationship Building
attributes.description: Which themes represent how they build relationships and contribute to a team culture? (e.g. Empathy, Includer, Positivity)

attributes.name: Strategic Thinking
attributes.description: Which themes represent how they think, make decisions, and empower those around them? (e.g. Futuristic, Input, Learner)

attributes.name: Interpretation
attributes.description: What does the character's overall strengths profile indicate about who they are and how they think and behave?
